des: "I came up with this recipe after I was no longer able to find my favorite mango salsa couscous in my area. My husband says this recipe tastes like the original. It is very quick and easy to make."
ins: Bring water to a boil in a 2-quart saucepan; stir in couscous, mango, salsa, cumin, and curry powder. Cover, reduce heat, and simmer until water is absorbed, about 2 minutes. Remove from heat and let stand for 5 minutes. Fluff with a fork before serving.
